title: Spade Smart Reserves
tooltip: This reserve is the protection scheme responsible to protect customer Saving Vault deposits from bankruptcy, insolvency, or loss of funds. The insurance coverage provided to you by the Spade Smart Reserves protects Saving Vault deposits in these currencies: US Dollar, British Pound, and Euros for up to $1,000,000 per individual.
bottom_tooltip: Sum of both from contributors from our Liquidity pool & Collateral collected from loans

title: Borrowed
tooltip: This is the amount of money you have borrowed from the Spade Cash Reserve for a single loan, by providing asset collateral which meets our standard.
bottom_tooltip: Number of Borrowers who have provided collateral to have access to our liquidity at the appropriate LTV

title: Collateral Value
tooltip: This is the value of the assets you have provided as a form of security to borrow cash for a single loan from Spadeâ€™s Cash Reserves.
bottom_tooltip: Number of Contributors who have provided the appropriate collateral for access to our cash liquidity pool at the appropriate LTV
